body.p: I could smell you before I could see you, sneered a voice from the leaves above me. A bowstring creaked as it stretched.

p.q: ...and I could hear you before I could smell you. This land is sacred, and defiling it warrants death.

body.p: My body was still, but my fingers twitched and my mind raced as I weighed the pride of elves against their reasonableness.
